nodes.text: Herdessa was an astronomical object located in the galaxy's Mid Rim that was situated along the Corellian Run at Q-16 on the Standard Galactic Grid. Herdessa was represented in the Galactic Senate and later the Imperial Senate by Senator Shea Sadashassa. Vryant, a soldier in the Imperial Army, served six years on Herdessa.

Herdessa was first mentioned in the 2016 roleplaying game game Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, published by Fantasy Flight Games. In Star Wars Legends continuity, Herdessa first appeared in the Star Wars 88: Figurehead, written by Mary Jo Duffy, penciled by Bob McLeod and published by Marvel Comics on June 26, 1984.
